name: Intro
commands: Do you want to play tutorial
This is a tutorial map |Go visit houses and villages to learn more about the controls.

Use the arrow keys to control the cursor.|X will be your 'select' button. Press 'X' on yourself to move.|Z will be your 'cancel' button'.|C will be your 'details' button. Use it on units and menu options to get more info on them
Visit the houses if you need a refresher on the controls.|If you want to visit houses and villages|Move your unit onto the tile it's located and select Visit.
I'll be waiting inside the castle. Take your time.
Seize the castle when you're ready to continue your training.
